thread.title: Easton's Kevin Lapsansky is the lehighvalleylive Boys Cross Country Athlete of the Week
thread.title_full: Easton's Kevin Lapsansky is the lehighvalleylive Boys Cross Country Athlete of the Week

title: Easton's Kevin Lapsansky is the lehighvalleylive Boys Cross Country Athlete of the Week
text:
Kevin Lapsansky , Easton 
The Rover senior posted the fastest area time at the Paul Short Run at Lehigh University’s Goodman Campus in 16 minutes and 1 second. He finished 14th in the elite ‘Brown’ race. 
Earlier in the week Lapsansky won an Eastern Pennsylvania Conference dual meet at Pocono Mountain West in 16 minutes, 54 seconds. 
Honorable Mention: Sr. Will Alpaugh , Freedom; Sr. Jake Hardin , Phillipsburg; Sr. Gavin Kemery , Northern Lehigh; Sr. Daniel Kyvelos , Parkland; Sr. Brendan McGill , Voorhees; Sr. Dan Quigley , Freedom; So. Chris Romero , Voorhees; Sr. Rob Whitney , Voorhees.
